item.Q:
Write the character:
correct; right; so; thus; like this; -ly
item.A:
rán
然后 (然後) ránhòu after; then (afterwards); after that; afterwards

item.Q:
Write the character:
before; in front; ago; former; previous; earlier; front
item.A:
qián
目前 mùqián at the present time; currently

item.Q:
Write the character:
square; quadrilateral; direction; one side; just; surname
item.A:
fāng
方法 fāngfǎ method; way; means

item.Q:
Write the character:
day; sun; date; day of the month; abbr. for Japan
item.A:
rì
日本 Rìběn Japan; Japanese

item.Q:
Write the character:
to feel; to move; to touch; to affect
item.A:
gǎn
感到 gǎndào to feel; to sense; to have the feeling that; think that; to move; to affect

item.Q:
Write the character:
moon; month
item.A:
yuè
十二月 shíèryuè December; twelfth month

item.Q:
Write the character:
distribution
item.A:
biǎo
表示 biǎoshì to express; to show; to say; to state; to indicate

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: from; to obey; to observe; to follow; surname
2: lax; yielding; unhurried
item.A:
traditional: 從
1: cóng 2: cōng
从而 (從而) cóngér thus; thereby 从属 (從屬) cōngshǔ hypotaxis

item.Q:
Write the character:
society; group
item.A:
shè
社会 (社會) shèhuì society

item.Q:
Write the character:
to tell; to inform; to say
item.A:
gào
报告 (報告) bàogào to inform; report; make known; speech; talk; lecture
